title: Secret of the Big Easy
description: Dr. Marie Bartek struggles to gain control over the new psychic abilities she encounters while attending a veterinarian conference in the French Quarter of New Orleans. These recent visions prompt her to work with local police and members of the Sullivanâ€™s Island Paranormal Society team to help solve the succession of heinous satanic murders, while fighting against a demon from taking over her mind. Secret of the Big Easy is the second book in the series, after Sullivan's Secret, with Dr. Marie Bartek and the SIPS team.
author: Robin  Murphy
